source_objects.description: From negotiation tactics to communication strategies, winning friends to persuading colleagues, learn how to most effectively make an impact with these courses on influence.
source_objects.title: Influence

items.title: Courageous Conversations: Conquer Your Relationship Fears

visible_instructors.name: Chris
visible_instructors.title: Chris Hogan
visible_instructors.job_title: ROHEI Practice Group Leader, Executive Coaching

items.headline: 10 Questions to Conquer Your Relationship Fears and Live with Courage
objectives_summary: Apply the 10 questions of a Courageous Conversation to identify your current most critical issues at home, work or in the community
Activate the 4 Relational Fibres which are integral to a successful Courageous Conversation
Identify your Mental and Emotional Realities and to compare against the what is really true

items.title: Influence People: Master of the First Impression
items.headline: Learn How to Read and Influence People. Practice on the go!
objectives_summary: Successfully communicate with groups of people and individuals
Build a good first impression
"Read" and influence people

items.title: Living Your Dreams With Unstoppable Passion
items.headline: Use Your Passion to Experience Your Ideal Life
objectives_summary: How to find their passions and live life to the fullest!
How to get UNSTUCK so that you can move forward in your pursuit of happiness and passion!
How Passion is an integral part of your Job and work and how to use it to achieve success!

items.title: Persuasion Power 4: Persuasion Psychology Hack "Yes Engines"
items.headline: Create an Almost Irresistible Urge in Others to Agree with You Using a 3 Step System Based on a Persuasion Shortcut
objectives_summary: EXPAND Your Understanding of Persuasion Psychology with Simple to Understand Language
INCREASE Your Sales Prowess and Closing Rate Without Being Manipulative or Aggressive
BUILD Strategic “Yes Engines” That Create an Almost Irresistible Force of Agreement in Others

items.title: Real8Ability Factors: Master Relationships and Communication

visible_instructors.name: Chris
visible_instructors.title: Chris Hogan
visible_instructors.job_title: ROHEI Practice Group Leader, Executive Coaching

items.headline: 8 Keys To Master Relationships and Communication
objectives_summary: Apply the Eight Real8Ability Factors when interacting with others at home, work or in the community
Give others a safe space to express what’s going on inside of them to hear what they are really feeling
Be interested, rather than interesting to understand the other person’s reality better

items.title: Leadership, Character, Ethics: Building Effective Leaders
items.headline: Building effective leaders who lead and influence through integrity and strength of character by following Jesus' model.
objectives_summary: Grasp the power of your influence
Develop character qualities necessary to be a great leader
Eliminate pride and fear from your decision-making

items.title: The Ultimate How To Self-Publish Like A Pro Course
items.headline: Step-by-Step Visual Guide to Publishing Your Book and Building an Authors Platform
objectives_summary: Professionally self-publish your book through CreateSpace and sell it on Amazon
Publish your book as a Kindle e-book and connect it to your physical book on Amazon
Build an authors platform with a self-hosted Wordpress website

items.title: Listen To Me: How To Get People To Hear What You Have To Say

visible_instructors.name: Laura
visible_instructors.job_title: Author, Speaker, Business Coach and Corporate Trainer
visible_instructors.title: Laura Browne

items.headline: Learn how a few small adjustments can help you get your messages across to everyone.
objectives_summary: You will learn about the 4 main communication preferences and how you can get your message across to everyone more effectively.
You will take a quiz to help you to understand which of the 4 communication preferences you tend to use most.
You'll learn how to recognize how other people prefer to get information and which people are most and least likely to listen to you.

items.title: Hypnosis - Learn 11 Hypnotic Phrases For Influence

visible_instructors.name: Pradeep
visible_instructors.title: Pradeep Aggarwal
visible_instructors.job_title: Founder of Institute Of Mind Control & Development, India

items.headline: Hypnosis - Learn 11 Hypnotic Language For Influence And Persuasion
objectives_summary: By the end of the course you will learn Hypnotic language to influence people in your personal and professional life
You will also learn techniques to relax instantly and anchor high confidence whenever you want in life and at important situations
You will be more confident and achieve more success while conversing with people and will be able to influence them more effectively than before and achieve your goals

items.title: Effective Body Language for Communication and Influence

visible_instructors.name: Sunil
visible_instructors.job_title: I'm an expert at building your skills
visible_instructors.title: Sunil Bhatla

items.headline: Supercharge your interviewing, networking, elevator pitching and public speaking.
objectives_summary: Practical hands-on training, not just talk
How to train your body to absorb new body language
How to build muscle memory so that you don’t forget what you learn

items.title: Advanced Persuasion Techniques: Conversational Hypnosis

visible_instructors.name: Amitkumar
visible_instructors.job_title: NLP Trainer, Psychotherapist, Success Coach, Hypnotherapist
visible_instructors.title: Amitkumar Pathak

items.headline: How to secretly influence others and get them to think & act as you wish to. The power of hypnosis in covert influence
objectives_summary: Get better results in business and personal life by being able to influence people better. The course will teach scientific methods of using language and speaking style that will cast a hypnotic spell on listeners and install suggestions in their mind. The course will also teach techniques to deal with resistance and objections by listeners. The techniques can be applied in any format of communication: Written as well as Oral.

items.title: How to Create Silent Subliminal Recordings
items.headline: Silent Subliminal recordings are responsible for being the easiest way to change how we think and act
objectives_summary: How to Create Silent Subliminal Messages
How to Write Effective Affirmations
How to add Specific Binaural Beats

items.title: Masterclass on TEDx Talks

visible_instructors.name: Onkar Khullar
visible_instructors.title: Onkar Khullar aka Digital Gandhi
visible_instructors.job_title: 17 Time TEDx Speaker & 500 sessions across india

items.headline: Revealing the secrets from a 17 Time TEDx Speaker
objectives_summary: Public Speaking infront of minimum 100 people
Propose their Lover
Engage the audience

items.title: Defusing Polarization: Understanding Divisive Politics

visible_instructors.name: Steph
visible_instructors.job_title: Resolving all needs, with loving deeds
visible_instructors.title: Steph Turner

items.headline: Realize how your differently experienced needs create political differences and fuels polarization.
objectives_summary: By the end of this course you will be able to neutralize the most offensive culprit to political polarization: rationalized disrespect for one another’s specific needs.
You will be able to attract respect across the political divide, as you sharpen your new skill for prioritizing each other’s needs ahead of ideology.

You will be able to see where others come from with their political views. Instead of denouncing them, or agreeing with them, you will now catch a glimpse of the vulnerable needs lurking behind the hard shell of their proclaimed political reasoning.

items.title: The Art Of Persuasion
items.headline: The secret to understanding and influencing human behavior, finally yours
objectives_summary: You will discover 4 main influencers of human behavior
You will learn 6 persuasion techniques based on human subconscious decisions
5 more techniques leveraging social triggers

items.title: Know yourself through Myers Briggs and relationship building

visible_instructors.title: Neil Mitchell
visible_instructors.name: Neil
visible_instructors.job_title: Coach, trainer and lover of learning!

items.headline: All you need to understand yourself better... and other people.  Vital for successful relationships in any context.
objectives_summary: Myers Briggs
Personality profiling
Personality preferences
